name: Steam Prison
description: There are two kinds of people: the rulers and the ruled. The Heights are a gorgeous utopia. The Depths, a filthy industrial wasteland. Our heroine, raised in the Heights, has nothing but contempt for those below.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7+ 处理器: Pentium 4+ 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: 1280 x 720 Supported DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 5 GB 可用空间 声卡: Direct Sound Compatible PCM device
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 处理器: Dual Core E8400+ 内存: 2 GB RAM
